scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm --prefix \"Back End\" run dev" "npm --prefix \"Front End\" run dev"
scripts.dev:nodemon: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm --prefix \"Back End\" run dev" "npm --prefix \"Front End\" run dev:nodemon"
scripts.prod: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm --prefix \"Back End\" run prod" "npm --prefix \"Front End\" run build && npm --prefix \"Front End\" run preview"
